name: GLKTextureInfoAlphaState
desc: Values that describe the alpha information stored in a source imageâ€™s pixel data.

items.name: case none
items.desc: Indicates that the texture has no alpha information.

items.name: case nonPremultiplied
items.desc: Indicates that the color values in the texture were not premultiplied by the alpha value.

items.name: case premultiplied
items.desc: Indicates that the color values in the texture have already been premultiplied by the alpha value.
